name: Beat Defeat Repeat
description:
BEAT. DEFEAT. REPEAT.

Can't a person enjoy a night out and a drink at the club without being danced at!
Enjoy the BEAT > Beat the creeps to DEFEAT the game > REPEAT to get the best score!

BDR is a classic beat em up where you fend off a legion of club creeps. Made by just three people in a week outside of their normal industry job hours, BDR also boasts hand drawn animation, and all original soundtrack.

Beat Defeat Repeat was created for TOJam 2021: Feels Like a Rerun
CREDITS:
Programing - Niko Ketsilis (@nikoketsilis)
Music and Additional Artwork - Raymond Lefebvre (RaymoVizion)
Animation - Kosta Ketsilis (@kostopolis)
